content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
I had an incredible KBBQ dinner experience at Woo Hyang Woo! Our server, Alex, was outstanding. From the moment we sat down, he provided attentive and friendly service. The meat selection was top-notch, and Alex guided us through the cooking process with expertise. The flavors were exquisite, and the ambiance was perfect for a memorable evening. I'll definitely be coming back for more delicious KBBQ at Woo Hyang Woo, and I highly recommend asking for Alex as your server!
